name: Project3
description:
The app is a paint program that creates and deletes shapes that you can choose from with a dropdown menu. The shapes can also be edited to spin, change colors, and have transparency. New features:

  1. UI animation. The user can use the H and J keys to hide and show the UI using animation.
  2. Clock animation. The user can use the I and O keys to animate the clock into growing larger or smaller
  3. Drawing a prefab. The user selects the prefab from a dropdown menu and can then use it for painting.
